meaningMnemonic: It can <kanji>melt</kanji> a <kanji>boulder</kanji>? What is this stuff that's so hot? It's <vocabulary>lava</vocabulary>. It's also probably made from melted boulders too, come to think of it.
readingMnemonic: This word uses the on'yomi reading for the kanji, but you haven't learned the on'yomi reading for 岩, which is がん. When you think of <vocabulary>lava</vocabulary>, think about <reading>Ga</reading>ndhi, coming out of the lava. He's immune, because he's a robot.
